package.name: lindbaum_backendpayment
package.summary: Adds a payment method only available for admin orders
package.description:
This very simple extension adds a payment method to your shop that is only available in the backend, when an admin edits or creates orders.
The payment method can be customised in "name" (shown in invoices etc) and "New order status" (defaults to "Pending").
package.notes: Always backup before install. This extension is provided as is, no guarantees taken & installation at your own risk. I will try to provide support when I find the time.
